column1: Proj.       Proj.       Proj.        Proj.    Proj.     Proj.
1/ For data comparability, does not include the EU agricultural subsidies reflected in authorities’ budget reports starting 2016.
2/ Includes EU-financed capital projects. For data comparability, does not include the EU agricultural subsidies reflected in authorities’ budget reports starting 2016.
3/ Does not include all capital spending.
4/ Total consolidated general-government debt, including state government debt, local government debt, and guarantees.
